news_header: Ten Pakistani border police killed in an attack by Tehreek-e-Taliban in northern Pakistan.
news_text: On Thursday night, ten members of the Pakistani border police were killed in an attack by the Islamist group Tehreek-e-Taliban in northern Pakistan. Local security sources reported that a total of 20 border police were targeted in the assault, which lasted nearly an hour. The resurgence of the Taliban in neighboring Afghanistan has led to an increase in violence in Pakistan.
